root['Desc'].new_value: When memosprite's turn starts, the wearer and the memosprite each gain 1 stack of 'Commemoration.' Each stack increases DMG dealt by [8|12]%, stacking up to 4 time(s). 'Commemoration' is removed from the wearer and the memosprite when the memosprite disappears.
root['Desc'].old_value: When memosprite's turn starts, the wearer and the memosprite each gain 1 stack of 'Commemoration' respectively. Each stack increases DMG dealt by [8|12]%, stacking up to 4 time(s). 'Commemoration' is removed from the wearer and the memosprite when the memosprite disappears.
